trans-unit.source: Configures the ASP.NET process model settings on an Internet Information Services (IIS) Web server.
trans-unit.target: 設定 ASP.NET 處理序模型設定網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) Web 伺服器上。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessModelSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `processModel` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: ProcessModelSection 類別可用來以程式設計方式存取和修改`processModel`組態檔區段。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessModelSection class controls various aspects of the ASP.NET worker process, including its lifetime, the number of instances created at a time, what security identity it runs under, and the size of the CLR thread pool to service requests.
trans-unit.target: ProcessModelSection 類別控制各方面的 ASP.NET 工作者處理序，包括其存留期間，建立一次什麼樣的安全性識別下，執行的執行個體數目和大小的 CLR 執行緒集區，以服務要求。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET is running under IIS 6 in native mode, ASP.NET uses the IIS 6 process model and ignores most settings in this section.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 以 IIS 6 執行原生模式時，ASP.NET 會使用 IIS 6 處理序模型，並忽略大部分的設定，這一節。

trans-unit.source: Use the IIS administration user interface (UI) to configure those properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IIS 系統管理使用者介面 (UI) 來設定這些屬性。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET still uses the following properties, which can be configured through the configuration file: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.RequestQueueLimit%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.ResponseDeadlockInterval%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxWorkerThreads%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxIOThreads%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MinWorkerThreads%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MinWorkerThreads%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 仍會使用下列屬性，可以透過組態檔來設定︰ <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.RequestQueueLimit%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.ResponseDeadlockInterval%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxWorkerThreads%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxIOThreads%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MinWorkerThreads%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MinWorkerThreads%2A>。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MinWorkerThreads%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MinWorkerThreads%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxIOThreads%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxWorkerThreads%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.ResponseDeadlockInterval%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.RequestQueueLimit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `processModel` section cannot be encrypted using the protected-configuration feature or tools because it is consumed by the ASP.NET ISAPI extension.
trans-unit.target: `processModel`使用受保護的組態功能或工具，因為它由 ASP.NET ISAPI 延伸模組就無法加密 > 一節。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection"></xref> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection"></xref>類別使用預設設定。

trans-unit.source: The ProcessModelSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: ProcessModelSection 建構函式不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。</xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ASP.NET performance settings are automatically configured for ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 ASP.NET 的效能設定會自動設定 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If the AutoConfig value is set to `false`, explicit Web.config values are used to determine performance configuration for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 如果自動設定值設定為`false`，明確 Web.config 值可用來判斷 ASP.NET 應用程式的效能設定。

trans-unit.source: If the AutoConfig value is set to `true`, the performance settings are automatically configured for the ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 如果自動設定值設定為`true`，ASP.NET 應用程式的自動設定的效能設定。

trans-unit.source: The AutoConfig value is explicitly set to `true` in the Machine.config file.
trans-unit.target: 自動設定值明確設定為`true`Machine.config 檔案中。

trans-unit.source: The default code value is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設程式碼的值設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the AutoConfig value is removed from Machine.config, the explicit settings are used instead of the auto-configured settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果從 Machine.config 中移除自動設定值，則明確的設定會使用而不是自動設定的設定。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if performance settings are automatically configured for ASP.NET applications; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果效能設定會自動設定 ASP.NET 應用程式。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how long a request is left in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出時間的要求會留在佇列中。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies how long a request is queued before ASP.NET performs a client connected check.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會指定要求的時間之前 ASP.NET 執行用戶端連接檢查，排入佇列。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the interval expires while the request is still queued, a client connected check is done before passing the request over to the ASP.NET worker process for handling.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 間隔時間過期時要求仍在佇列中，如果用戶端連線檢查完畢後再要求傳遞到 ASP.NET 工作者處理序的處理。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value indicating the queuing time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，指出佇列的時間。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 5 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication for DCOM security.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 DCOM 安全性的驗證層級。

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel>, DCOM determines the authentication level using its normal security-negotiation algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性值設定為<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel>，DCOM 會決定使用標準的安全性交涉演算法的驗證層級。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel>

trans-unit.source: The default value assigned to this property, as specified in the Machine.config file, is <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 指派給這個屬性，指定在 Machine.config 檔案中，預設值是<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel>.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, DCOM authenticates the credentials of the client only when the client establishes a relationship with the server.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，DCOM 用戶端建立與伺服器之間的關係時，才會驗證用戶端憑證。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication for COM security.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 COM 安全性的驗證層級。

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel>, DCOM determines the impersonation level using its normal security-negotiation algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性值設定為<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel>，DCOM 會決定使用標準的安全性交涉演算法的模擬等級。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: The default value assigned to this property, as specified in the Machine.config file, is <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 指派給這個屬性，指定在 Machine.config 檔案中，預設值是<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel>.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the server process can impersonate the client's security context while acting on behalf of the client.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，伺服器處理序可模擬用戶端代表用戶端時的安全性內容。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which processors on a multiprocessor server are eligible to run ASP.NET processes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出哪一個處理器的多處理器伺服器上有資格執行 ASP.NET 處理序。

trans-unit.source: The CpuMask value specifies a bit pattern that indicates the CPUs eligible to run ASP.NET threads.
trans-unit.target: CpuMask 值會指定位元模式，表示 Cpu 適合執行 ASP.NET 執行緒。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.WebGarden%2A> property is set to `true`, the CpuMask limits worker processes to the number of eligible CPUs.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.WebGarden%2A>屬性設定為`true`，CpuMask 限制合格的 Cpu 數目的工作者處理序。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.WebGarden%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowed number of worker processes is equal to the number of CPUs.
trans-unit.target: 允許的背景工作處理序數目上限等於 Cpu 數目。

trans-unit.source: By default, all CPUs are enabled and ASP.NET launches one process for each CPU.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會啟用所有 Cpu 和 ASP.NET 啟動的每一 CPU 的其中一個處理序。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.WebGarden%2A> property is set to `false`, the CpuMask attribute is ignored and only one worker process will run.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.WebGarden%2A>屬性設定為`false`、 CpuMask 屬性會被忽略，只有一個背景工作處理序會執行。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.WebGarden%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number representing the bit pattern to apply.
trans-unit.target: 代表的數字的位元模式來套用。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0xFFFFFFFF.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 0xFFFFFFFF。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the process model is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否啟用處理序模型。

trans-unit.source: The Enable property specifies whether ASP.NET is hosted in an external worker process.
trans-unit.target: 啟用屬性會指定是否要將 ASP.NET 裝載外部的工作者處理序中。

trans-unit.source: If Enable is `true`, ASP.NET is hosted in an external worker process; otherwise, it runs directly in Inetinfo.exe.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用`true`，ASP.NET 裝載外部的工作者處理序中; 否則它會直接在 Inetinfo.exe 中執行。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Running ASP.NET in Inetinfo.exe is not recommended, because this involves running the application in the Local System security context.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 不建議在 Inetinfo.exe 中執行的 ASP.NET，因為這項作業包括本機系統的安全性內容中執行應用程式。

trans-unit.source: When ASP.NET runs in Internet Information Services (IIS) 6 native mode, this setting is ignored, so there is usually no reason to set it to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 當 ASP.NET 執行網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6 原生模式時，會忽略此設定，因此通常不需要將它設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the process model is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用的流程模型。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the period of inactivity after which ASP.NET automatically ends the worker process.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出一段時間沒有活動之後 ASP.NET 自動結束背景工作處理序。

trans-unit.source: The worker process is restarted (bounced) when the IdleTimeout property value is reached.
trans-unit.target: 工作者處理序便會重新啟動 （退回） 達到 IdleTimeout 屬性值。

trans-unit.source: By default, only two conditions cause the process to bounce: the process exceeds the allowed memory limit, or the process exceeds the allowed number of requests that can be queued.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，只有兩個條件會造成處理序彈回︰ 處理序超過允許的記憶體限制，或處理序超出允許的可排入佇列的要求數目。

trans-unit.source: You can add other conditions to the default ones.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入其他條件為預設值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the IdleTimeout property to limit the time the worker process is idle.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用 IdleTimeout 屬性來限制工作者處理序處於閒置狀態的時間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> value indicating the idle time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，指出閒置的時間。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default value is Infinite, which corresponds to <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是無限值，對應至<xref:System.TimeSpan>。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the event types to be logged to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出要在事件記錄檔記錄的事件類型。

trans-unit.source: By using this property correctly, you can filter the errors the system can log.
trans-unit.target: 正確使用這個屬性，您可以篩選系統可以記錄的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: After you have an idea of the application's malfunctions or bottlenecks, you might want to devise a strategy that narrows the range of errors you are interested in.
trans-unit.target: 了解應用程式的功能問題或瓶頸之後，您可能想要設計策略，以縮小的錯誤您感興趣的範圍。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelLogLevel"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelLogLevel"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelLogLevel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelLogLevel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum allowed number of application domains in one process.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定一個處理序中允許的應用程式定義域數目上限。

trans-unit.source: If the MaxAppDomains threshold is exceeded, the least-used application domain is shut down if a new application domain must start.
trans-unit.target: 如果超過 MaxAppDomains 臨界值時，最少使用的應用程式定義域會關閉必須啟動新的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowed number of application domains in one process.
trans-unit.target: 允許應用程式定義域中其中一個處理序數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出的 CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 的 I/O 執行緒數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The value of MaxIOThreads must be equal to or greater than the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MinFreeThreads%2A> setting in the `httpRuntime` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: MaxIOThreads 的值必須等於或大於<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MinFreeThreads%2A>中設定`httpRuntime`組態區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MinFreeThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can have some control over the CPU utilization by setting the number of worker threads and I/O threads, using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxWorkerThreads%2A> property and the MaxIOThreads property respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以有一些控制的 CPU 使用率設定工作者執行緒和 I/O 執行緒數目使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxWorkerThreads%2A>屬性和 MaxIOThreads 屬性分別。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxWorkerThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two types of threads is that the latter are bound to I/O objects, such as a stream or a pipe, and the former are traditional unrestricted threads.
trans-unit.target: 兩種執行緒之間的差異是，後者會繫結 I/O 物件，例如資料流或管道，而前者為傳統的無限制的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: For Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 and later, ASP.NET processes requests on worker threads.
trans-unit.target: 為網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6.0 版和更新版本，在 ASP.NET 處理背景工作執行緒上的要求。

trans-unit.source: This is because ASP.NET is integrated within IIS.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為 ASP.NET 整合在 IIS 中。

trans-unit.source: These threads are obtained from the process-wide CLR thread pool belonging to an application.
trans-unit.target: 這些執行緒會從屬於應用程式的整個處理序的 CLR 執行緒集區取得。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Usually the default values for the allowed threads are sufficient to keep the CPU utilization high.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 所允許之執行緒的預設值通常足以保留 CPU 使用率過高。

trans-unit.source: If for some reason your application is slow, perhaps waiting for external resources, you could try to increase the number of threads to a value less than 100.
trans-unit.target: 如果基於某些原因您的應用程式變慢，可能在等待外部資源，您可以嘗試增加的值小於 100 的執行緒數目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of threads.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default is 20.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 20。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 的工作者執行緒的最大數量。

trans-unit.source: The value of MaxWorkerThreads must be equal to or greater than the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MinFreeThreads%2A> setting in the `httpRuntime` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: MaxWorkerThreads 的值必須等於或大於<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MinFreeThreads%2A>中設定`httpRuntime`組態區段。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpRuntimeSection.MinFreeThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can have some control over the CPU utilization by setting the number of worker threads and I/O threads, using the MaxWorkerThreads property and, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxIOThreads%2A> property, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以有一些控制的 CPU 使用率設定工作者執行緒和 I/O 執行緒數目使用 MaxWorkerThreads 屬性，<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxIOThreads%2A>屬性，分別。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.MaxIOThreads%2A>

trans-unit.source: The difference between the two types of threads is that the latter are bound to I/O objects, such as a stream or a pipe, and the former are traditional unrestricted threads.
trans-unit.target: 兩種執行緒之間的差異是，後者會繫結 I/O 物件，例如資料流或管道，而前者為傳統的無限制的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: For Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 and higher, ASP.NET processes requests on worker threads.
trans-unit.target: 為網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 6.0 版和更高版本，在 ASP.NET 處理背景工作執行緒上的要求。

trans-unit.source: This is because ASP.NET is integrated within IIS.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為 ASP.NET 整合在 IIS 中。

trans-unit.source: These threads are obtained from the process-wide CLR thread pool belonging to an application.
trans-unit.target: 這些執行緒會從屬於應用程式的整個處理序的 CLR 執行緒集區取得。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Usually the default values for the allowed threads are sufficient to keep the CPU utilization high.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 所允許之執行緒的預設值通常足以保留 CPU 使用率過高。

trans-unit.source: If for some reason your application is slow, perhaps waiting for external resources, you could try to increase the number of threads to a value less than 100.
trans-unit.target: 如果基於某些原因您的應用程式變慢，可能在等待外部資源，您可以嘗試增加的值小於 100 的執行緒數目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of threads.
trans-unit.target: 執行緒的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The default is 20.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 20。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum allowed memory size.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出允許的最大記憶體大小。

trans-unit.source: The memory size is expressed as a percentage of the total system memory.
trans-unit.target: 系統記憶體總數的百分比表示的記憶體大小。

trans-unit.source: This is the amount of memory a worker process can consume before ASP.NET restarts (bounces) it.
trans-unit.target: 這是背景工作處理序可以取用 ASP.NET 重新啟動 （彈回） 之前的記憶體數量它。

trans-unit.source: The percentage of the total system memory.
trans-unit.target: 系統記憶體總數的百分比。

trans-unit.source: The default is 60 percent.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 60%。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 CLR 執行緒集區中的每一 CPU 的 I/O 執行緒的最小數目。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
trans-unit.target: CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 的 I/O 執行緒最小數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum number of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 CLR 執行緒集區中的每一 CPU 的工作者執行緒的最小數目。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool
trans-unit.target: CLR 執行緒集區中每個 CPU 的工作者執行緒數目下限

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the password to use for the Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出要使用 Windows 身分識別的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The Password property must be used with the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.UserName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Password 屬性必須搭配<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.UserName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When present, these property values cause the worker process to run with the configured Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: 存在時，這些屬性值會造成工作者處理序，以設定的 Windows 身分識別來執行。

trans-unit.source: The password to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The default value is AutoGenerate.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是自動產生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval at which the ISAPI extension pings the worker process to determine whether it is running.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 ISAPI 延伸模組會偵測來判斷它是否正在執行的工作者處理序的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The worker process is restarted (bounced) if it is not running after the PingFrequency interval has expired.
trans-unit.target: 工作者處理序會重新啟動 （退回），如果沒有執行 PingFrequency 間隔過期之後。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> defining the time interval.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>定義的時間間隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval after which a non-responsive worker process is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出無回應的工作者處理序重新啟動之後的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The ISAPI extensions ping the worker process at the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.PingFrequency%2A> interval.
trans-unit.target: ISAPI 擴充程式 ping 工作者處理序在<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.PingFrequency%2A>間隔。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.PingFrequency%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the worker process does not respond within the PingTimeout interval, the process is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 如果工作者處理序沒有回應 PingTimeout 間隔內，處理程序會重新啟動。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> defining the time interval.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>定義的時間間隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 5 秒。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of requests allowed before a worker process is recycled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出允許背景工作處理序回收之前的要求數目。

trans-unit.source: If the number of requests is exceeded, ASP.NET automatically launches a new worker process to take the place of the current one.
trans-unit.target: 如果超過要求數目，ASP.NET 會自動啟動新的工作者處理序來取代目前的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The number of allowed requests.
trans-unit.target: 允許的要求數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is Infinite.
trans-unit.target: 預設為無限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of requests allowed in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出佇列中允許的要求數目。

trans-unit.source: If the number of requests allowed in the queue is exceeded, ASP.NET begins returning "503 – Server Too Busy" errors to new requests.
trans-unit.target: 如果超過允許的佇列中要求的數目時，ASP.NET 會開始傳回"503-伺服器忙碌中 」 錯誤，以新的要求。

trans-unit.source: When this limit is reached, the system is operating in abnormal conditions.
trans-unit.target: 當達到此限制時，系統正在運作不正常的狀況。

trans-unit.source: This might be a symptom of a malfunction or, maybe, just high load.
trans-unit.target: 這可能是發生問題的徵兆或，有可能，只在高負載。

trans-unit.source: Restarting (bouncing) the worker process might become the only way to prevent further problems.
trans-unit.target: 重新啟動 （彈回） 工作者處理序可能會變得以防發生其他問題的唯一方式。

trans-unit.source: The number of requests allowed to be queued.
trans-unit.target: 允許排入佇列的要求數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 5000.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 5000。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval for the worker process to respond.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出回應的工作者處理序的時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: The process is restarted if there are queued requests and if there has not been a response during the time interval that is defined by ResponseDeadlockInterval.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有要求排入佇列，而且如果有回應 ResponseDeadlockInterval 所定義的時間間隔期間，會重新啟動處理程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> defining the interval.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>定義的間隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is 3 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 3 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: No longer used.
trans-unit.target: 不再使用。

trans-unit.source: This property is no longer used by ASP.NET and is provided for backward compatibility only.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不再使用 ASP.NET，並提供回溯相容性。

trans-unit.source: It will not cause a configuration error if it is already present in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 如果它已存在於組態檔中，它不會造成組態錯誤。

trans-unit.source: All recycling in the event of a deadlock condition is now controlled by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.ResponseDeadlockInterval%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當發生死結狀況時的回收所有現在受到<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.ResponseDeadlockInterval%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.ResponseDeadlockInterval%2A>

trans-unit.source: Not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 不適用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of requests queued by the ISAPI while waiting for a new worker process to start handling the requests.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出要求的數目上限 isapi 佇列等候新的工作者處理序開始處理要求。

trans-unit.source: When this limit is exceeded, a client request will receive a 503 error until the worker process is ready.
trans-unit.target: 當超過這個限制時，用戶端要求會收到 503 錯誤，直到準備好的工作者處理序。

trans-unit.source: The number of requests queued.
trans-unit.target: 排入佇列的要求數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the file whose content must be used when a fatal error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出發生嚴重錯誤時，必須使用其內容的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file whose content is used instead of the default Server Unavailable message.
trans-unit.target: 會使用其內容，而不是預設的伺服器無法使用訊息檔案。

trans-unit.source: The file location can be a relative or an absolute file path.
trans-unit.target: 檔案位置可以是相對或絕對檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the file used when a fatal error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 發生嚴重錯誤時使用的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the time allowed for the worker process to shut down.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出允許的工作者處理序關閉時間。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the number of minutes allowed for the worker process to shut itself down gracefully.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性會指定允許本身正常關閉工作者處理序的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: When the timeout expires, ASP.NET shuts down the worker process forcibly.
trans-unit.target: 當逾時過期時，ASP.NET 關閉工作者處理序強制。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> defining the interval.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>定義的間隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 5 秒。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of minutes until ASP.NET launches a new worker process.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 ASP.NET 啟動新的工作者處理序之前的分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET launches a new worker process to take the place of the current one.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會啟動新的工作者處理序來取代目前的金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.TimeSpan> defining the interval.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>定義的間隔。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is Infinite.
trans-unit.target: 預設為無限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the user name for a Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示使用 Windows 身分識別的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: If present, the UserName defines a Windows identity different from that of the default process.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的話，使用者名稱會定義不同的預設程序使用 Windows 身分識別。

trans-unit.source: This identity is used to run the ASP.NET worker process.
trans-unit.target: 這個身分識別用來執行 ASP.NET 工作者處理序。

trans-unit.source: By default, UserName is set to the special value Machine, and the process runs under a user account named ASPNET that is created automatically when ASP.NET is installed.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，電腦的特殊值會設定使用者名稱和處理序會在名為 ASP.NET 安裝時自動建立的 ASPNET 使用者帳戶下執行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.Password%2A> property must be used with the UserName property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.Password%2A>屬性必須搭配使用者名稱屬性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.Password%2A>

trans-unit.source: When present, these property values cause the worker process to run with the configured Windows identity.
trans-unit.target: 存在時，這些屬性值會造成工作者處理序，以設定的 Windows 身分識別來執行。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the UserName property is set to System, with the password AutoGenerate, it defines an entity that runs the process as an administrative account and allows all ASP.NET user code running under the process to have full administrative privileges.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > UserName 屬性設定為系統中，使用密碼自動產生，它會定義實體的執行程序的系統管理帳戶，並允許所有處理序，以完整系統管理權限下執行的 ASP.NET 使用者程式碼。

trans-unit.source: So, pay close attention to this case, for the permissions allowed.
trans-unit.target: 因此，請密切注意到，請在此情況下，允許的權限。

trans-unit.source: The user name.
trans-unit.target: 使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default value is Machine.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是電腦。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value enabling the available CPUs to run the worker processes.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，讓可用的 Cpu 執行的工作者處理序。

trans-unit.source: The WebGarden property must be used with the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.CpuMask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: WebGarden 屬性必須搭配<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.CpuMask%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.CpuMask%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the WebGarden property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.CpuMask%2A> attribute is ignored and only one worker process runs.
trans-unit.target: 如果 WebGarden 屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.CpuMask%2A>屬性會被忽略，只有一個背景工作處理序執行。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.CpuMask%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A multiprocessor Web server is called a Web garden.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 多處理器的 Web 伺服器稱為 「 Web 處理序。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.CpuMask*> is used to map the worker processes to the number of eligible CPUs; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection.CpuMask*> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<> *> 用來將背景工作處理序對應到合格的 Cpu; 數目<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if <>*> is ignored.
